name: The Caribbean Sail
description: A whimsically dark 8-bit adventure about sailing the world in the 1700's - Developed by one nautical enthusiast!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or later Processor: A Potato will do Memory: 512 MB RAM DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 420 MB available space Sound Card: A voice for singing shanties
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or later Processor: 1.5 GHz or better Memory: 2 GB RAM DirectX: Version 9.0 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 1337 MB available space Sound Card: A good voice for singing shanties
